title: Auckland Council Dog Management Data
text: akldogs contains data transcribed Auckland Council’s annual Animal Management reports relating dogs management Auckland. goal make data accessible R users providing following data tables: dogs: Auckland dog population owners: Auckland dog owners enforcement: compliance enforcement activities impounds: outcomes dogs entering shelters service: Animal Management requests service

title: Auckland Council Dog Management Data
text: can install akldogs GitHub :

title: Auckland Council Dog Management Data
text: Data sourced Auckland Council Animal Management annual reports. package contains relevant data looking dog control activities. way data reported time Animal Management changed, please note following reduction known dog population FY2017 FY2018 likely due removal duplicate entries Auckland Council database. percentages given instead whole numbers, numbers derived proportions given nearest whole number, case desexing data. data reported split multiple categories combined, case desexing data, figures roaming dogs, figures dog attacks animals stock. Numbers Responsible Dog Owner Licence (RDOL) holders relates owners, number dogs registered owner holding RDOL. ‘unregistered dog’ data enforcement can include proactive work, rather just requests service. ‘East’ team added requests service data 2024, earlier teams removed numbers added ‘’ categories two priority types FY2015-FY2017 FY2021-FY2022.
